text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 2018 African Championships in Athletics was held on 2 August in Asaba, Nigeria.Results ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Tobi Amusan '''' |Rikenette Steenkamp '''' |Rosvitha Okou '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 3 of each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final.
